text: Salman Mohammed Al-Faraj is Saudi Arabian footballer, He currently play Neom club in Saudi First Division League. == Club career == === Al Hilal === On April 2022, Al-Faraj scored a goal against Al Shabab 2-1 to reach King Cup final. === Neom club === On 2024, Al-Faraj joined Neom club. == International career == Al-Faraj scored penalty goal against Egypt at 2018 World Cup 2-1 won. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:1989 births Category:Al Hilal SFC players
title: Salman Al-Faraj
